products.name: Body Oil & Soap Luxury Gift Box
products.description: Luxury Handcrafted Wooden Gift Box Set – Three Mini Nourishing Body Oils & Handmade Soap

products.name: 3 blissful bathbombs
products.description: Our I AM… Bath Bomb Set has been uniquely crafted using only the purest natural ingredients. Each delicately-fragranced bath bomb with its whimsical topping has been carefully designed to enhance the mood. Relish in the finest fusions of Mother Earth’s gentlest Essential Oils combined with relaxing Epsom Salts. Enjoy some precious “Me Time” and step into feeling Love, Free and Peace. This is a vegan product.

products.name: Helping hand gift box
products.description: With products to clean, repair and soften your mitts, this box says “I care about you, please keep your hands clean and cared for” like no other! Contains a Clean Hands Hand Sanitizer (in a plastic bottle- not as in image) and your choice of 3 x 30ml hand creams (Lemongrass & Bergamot, Rose, Jasmine & Bergamot) as well as a 30ml Skin Saviour.

products.name: Rosemary and peppermint lotion candle
products.description: This gorgeous product is a candle and a balm in one!!!! You light the candle, wait for the luxurious  balm to melt, then carefully pour a little of the melted,  warm balm onto your skin. This softening 350ml, treat of a treatment contains Eco Soy  Wax, Bees Wax, Cocoa and Shea Butter, Rosehip and sweet almond oil, plus oodles if natural, pure essential oils. A flippin perfect gift to your skin, and a fabtactic, scented candle, which  wafts its beautiful essential oils around yout home.  Oh and your left with a pretty bloom print jug. I have randomly printed these jugs myself onto fine, white porcelain, using my bloom print tile designs. The glow from  the  jug, when lit, is really magical! So in essence the design will be a lucky dip! All very unique, all very vintage and very pretty! Enjoy! X (burning time approx 12 hrs)

products.name: Beardsmith Complete Box
products.description: Our Beardsmith Gift Boxes pack a selection of our best products, chosen to satisfy any necessity, whether you’re buying it for yourself or as a gift. For or a new beard, an established beard, no beard or as a gift; Beardsmith has a range of gift boxes to suit all. The Complete Box offers a comprehensive selection of products.The box includes:Choice of 2 x Body Soap, Beard Soap, 100ml Beard Shampoo or 100ml Mint Shampoo Choice of 1 x 25ml Beard Oil (Original, Choice or Fresh)1 x 30ml Styling Wax

products.name: DIVINE GLOW VAULT
products.description: This is the ULTIMATE gift for the glow getter & makeup lover in your life! Packed full with one of every shade in both AURA GLOW GLOSS & DIVINELIGHTER Totalling at 6 amazing glossy & glowy products! Wrapped up in a hand tied bow ready to go under your tree!

products.name: Divine Lighter Gypsy Soul
products.description: Meet Naura Cosmetics DIVINE LIGHTER! A radiant glow like no other. Available in 3 shades for all skin tones and types. The ultra finely milled loose highlighting powders are smooth as butter and give the skin a fresh dewy look!

products.name: Luxury Chrome Shaving Set
products.description: Made from coated Brass, this beautiful Shaving Set is the ultimate gift to yourself or the man in your life. An investment piece that will last a lifetime if cared for correctly, this set offers a classy and close shave. The set includes; Luxury Chrome Safety Razor Synthetic Shaving Brush Brass Shaving Stand 5 Free Blades

products.name: Duluxe Skin Care Set
products.description: LOVE YOUR FACE - LEAVE NO TRACE This Sustainable Skincare Set includes a great mix of; Specialised Facial Soap Bar Cleansing Body Soap Bar Cocoa Butter & Beeswax Lip Balm Exfoliating Body Scrub Bar Bamboo Accessory

products.name: Ultimate Aromatherapy Treatments
products.description: Home Spa Heaven ~ Ultimate Aromatherapy Treatments Limited eddition of all of our favourite 100% natural handmade & holistic skincare treatments beautifully presented in an enormous hat / storage box that will daze and amaze that extra special someone in your life!

products.name: Relax & Sleep Well ~ Gift Box
products.description: product can help you relax, unwind, de-stress and sleep while also leaving your skin soft and beautifully fragranced Lavender & Fennel Pillow Spray Fall Asleep Easy Aromatherapy Rollerball Chamomile & Lavender Whipped Shea Body Butter White Lavender Essential Oil Soap Sleepy Lavender Bath & Body Oil Relaxing Lavender Essential Oil Bath Bomb

products.name: Seaweed Bath
products.description: Wild Seaweed, carefully and sustainably harvested by hand in Carlingford Lough. Characterised by its unique U shaped valley and striking beauty, the sheltered bay of Carlingford is ideal for seaweed harvesting. Our seaweed is washed and dried naturally with nothing added giving you an authentic seaweed experience. Seaweed has long been credited for is therapeutic benefits. It contains a number of active ingredients which have detoxifying properties and helps in the evacuation of toxins from the Lymphatic system.

products.name: Skin Savvy Queen Gift Set
products.description: For the woman who KNOWS her skin Contains: This is More Facial and Eye Serum (hyaluronic acid) 30ml Love Your Skin anti-ageing facial oil 30ml Love Your Skin face cream 50ml

products.name: Colorful Amber Gemstone and Silver Cufflinks
products.description: Exclusive Baltic Amber cuff links for men. These quality amber cuff links are made of Baltic amber gems set in solid sterling silver. A simple elegant statement. Ideal as a wedding gift for best man, groom or father of the bride. Or as an executive gift to reward results. Square shaped cuff links in mixed color Baltic Amber gems and 925 silver.

products.name: Elegant Amber Gemstone Earrings
products.description: These perfect spheres of honey amber will enhance your elegant style. Gold Plated Sterling Silver. The natural amber gem hangs on lever back gold plated sterling silver settings.

products.name: Eterica series necklace
products.description: 'eterica' series of contemporary jewellery - sterling silver formed into flowing pieces of timeless appeal, inspired by the elements water & air. Eterica necklace - shapes. Handcrafted in sterling silver with 20cm height X 13cm width, each necklace is uniquely hand-formed and then it is hand-polished to a glossy finish. Finally, the neckpiece is carefully packed with acid-free tissue in a bespoke metal box

products.name: Seafoam (Sweetheart) Seaglass Pendant
products.description: Seaglass Pendant – Sterling Silver Snake Chain. Our stunning Mermaid collection of necklace pendants are made using authentic naturally tumbled sea-glass which has spent countless years in the Irish Sea being smoothed by time, sand and waves. We carefully match our chains to the size, shape and colour of each unique piece of sea glass making these beautiful pendants a totally individual ocean gift to you, a friend or loved one.

products.name: Sea Glass Earrings Clear with Orange Abalone Shell Bead
products.description: Sterling Silver Sea-glass Drop Earrings. Stunning and perfectly frosted, these smooth Irish Sea-glass earrings are elegantly beautiful. Perfectly frosted genuine sea-glass gems hanging from a sterling silver 2.7cm hook. Designs are mixed with a smooth coloured abalone shell bead and a copper or titanium coloured bead. Perfect for those who love a naturally elegant pop of colour, these earrings will make a unique gift for yourself, a friend or loved one and will remind the wearer of the calming energies of the Ocean.

products.name: Mechanical Pocket Watch - Trinity Knots
products.description: A Mechanical Pocket Watch by Mullingar Pewter from Ireland, it has a polished stainless steel case and a 14 inch chain, the diameter of the watch is 2 inches. It comes in a beautiful presentation box as pictured. The piece is like the old fashioned watches and needs to be wound on a regular basis to keep the time up to date. The numerals are large and easily read, the inner workings can be seen clearly and are just a little hypnotic! The Watch is decorated with 4 Trinity Knots. Trinity Knots are an ancient Celtic Design that represented eternity.

products.name: Irish Silver Claddagh Ring
products.description: A stunning Irish Silver Claddagh Ring from one of Irelands top designers and manufacturers. The Claddagh Ring has been worn in Galway since the late 1600's. The sentiment of Love Loyalty and Friendship is a universal one and is hugely treasured. The Lough Mask Claddagh has been made by Fado Jewelelrs in Co Wicklow and finished to an exacting standard. It is made from Sterling Silver and has been Hallmarked by the Dublin Castle Assay Office

products.name: Copper hexagon earrings
products.description: These earrings have been hand carved from copper sheet and vinyl records and hand riveted with aluminium wire.  All copper jewellery is sealed with protectaclear to protect against tarnishing. Each piece is made to order so please allow a week for production. Earring studs are hypoallergenic stainless steel. All pieces are individually handcrafted with the utmost care so each piece is completely unique and of the highest quality.

products.name: Octopus necklace
products.description: Hand cut, hammered and oxidised copper, this necklace is lightweight and easy to wear. All copper jewellery is sealed with protectaclear to protect against tarnishing. Pendants come with stainless steel chain adjustable from approximately 16 to 18 inches (~ 40 - 45cm).

products.name: Green Copper earrings
products.description: These earrings have been hand carved from a green vinyl record and riveted to a hand cut and textured copper bar. Each piece is made to order so please allow up to a week for production. Earring studs and hooks are hypoallergenic stainless steel.
